channel.title: Comments on: big Witt vectors for everyone (1/2)

item.title: By: Sa Onne
item.dc:creator: Sa Onne
item.description:
Greetings! I just came across your blog --- thanks for all the interesting posts!
(1) I have not been able to find part two of this post on Witt vectors. Is it been posted under a different name?
(2) I have not been able see any comments, on this post or others. I have tried both firefox and the chrome browser.
THANKS!
item.content:encoded:
Greetings! I just came across your blog — thanks for all the interesting posts!

(1) I have not been able to find part two of this post on Witt vectors. Is it been posted under a different name?

(2) I have not been able see any comments, on this post or others. I have tried both firefox and the chrome browser.

THANKS!
